metadata.title: CVE-2017-2670 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
It was found in Undertow before 1.3.28 that with non-clean TCP close, the Websocket server gets into infinite loop on every IO thread, effectively causing DoS.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-2670` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libundertow-java - 1.4.18-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: undertow package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.18-1').
